head.title: School Closure Update 4/9/20 - Rolla Public Schools

input.name: __VIEWSTATE

a.title: Go to Rolla Junior High School

div.style: position: absolute; left: 0px; top: 0px; z-index: 100001; background-color: rgb(170, 170, 170); opacity: 0.5; display: none;

nav.div: Rolla Public Schools » News » What's New » School Closure Update 4/9/20

img.alt: This is the image for the news article titled School Closure Update 4/9/20

br.span: We are aware of the order made earlier today by Missouri Governor Parson to close all public and charter schools for the remainder of the year. More information regarding distance learning plans, meal services, and previously scheduled events will be made available to you very soon. We will continue to work hard to meet the needs of our students and families.

div.div: 500A Forum Drive, Rolla, MO 65401 | Phone 5734580100 | Fax 5734580105
